name: reinspire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make someone feel enthusiastic about something again: They hope that the new leader will reinspire the party. We have developed a groundbreaking scheme to retrain and reinspire our dedicated employees. Related word
inspire
More examplesFewer examplesWe need a new vision to reinspire the organization.My aim is to re-inspire and revitalize the people I work with.She said that taking the safe option would fail to re-inspire the voters.
